author: exurb1a
description:
Newly released book (you may need to change your region) ►https://tinyurl.com/hkzwzx3r
The introduction artwork was kindly done by Valeia. Her stuff ► https://www.instagram.com/valeia.s/ 

My stuff ► 

Other books what I wrote, yo: https://www.amazon.com/stores/Exurb1a/author/B06XFM14M8
I also make horrendous music: https://soundcloud.com/exurbia-1 
Help me to do this full-time if you're deranged enough (and thank you kindly): https://www.patreon.com/exurb1r?ty=h 

The sequence at the beginning was taken from a real game between Garry Kasparov and Nigel Short (the chess bit anyway): https://lichess.org/study/EJVBxFAl/wNuHLY1a

Thank you to Soy Sauce and Jimmy CakeShoes (https://www.youtube.com/@jimmycakeshoes9086) for lending me their voices.

Music used ► 

Summer, the Four Seasons - Vivaldi: https://youtu.be/muowVV_ITKc?si=Q0lx2aLkJDPSANvE

Storm in a Tea Cup - Ofer Ronen: https://youtu.be/50XYngZOlpo?si=IYU_8PgcTra1F3J3

I Think That You Should · IamDayLight · Johnny K · Paper Plas
title: Chess is When You Microdose Infinity
